code: import{LOCALHOST}from"../utils/Constants";import{getToken}from"./Login";export function isFollowApi(id){var uri="".concat(LOCALHOST,"/follower?id=").concat(id);var params={headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(getToken())}};return fetch(uri,params).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result;}).catch(function(error){return error;});}export function FollowApi(id){var uri="".concat(LOCALHOST,"/seguir?id=").concat(id);var params={method:"POST",headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(getToken())}};return fetch(uri,params).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result;}).catch(function(error){return error;});}export function UnfollowApi(id){var uri="".concat(LOCALHOST,"/unfollow?id=").concat(id);var params={method:"DELETE",headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(getToken())}};return fetch(uri,params).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result;}).catch(function(error){return error;});}export function getFollowers(data){var uri="".concat(LOCALHOST,"/users?").concat(data);var params={headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(getToken())}};return fetch(uri,params).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result;}).catch(function(error){return error;});}
